entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
